required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Survey to Evaluate Diabetes Management, Control, Chronic Complications, Psychosocial Aspects of Children With Type 1 Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: Diabcare Paediatric - A Survey-study on Diabetes Management, Complications and Psychosocial Aspects of Type 1 Childhood Diabetics

brief_summary.textblock: This study is conducted in Africa. The aim of this non-interventional study is to evaluate the current status of diabetes management, complications and psychosocial aspects for children with type 1 diabetes in Algeria.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At the first visit (only one study visit) after 12 month of follow up

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients on insulin therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the first visit (only one study visit) after 12 month of follow up
At the first visit (only one study visit) after 12 month of follow up
At the first visit (only one study visit) after 12 month of follow up
At the first visit (only one study visit) after 12 month of follow up

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients on OAD or other treatments
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the first visit (only one study visit) after 12 month of follow up

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients having complications (ophthalmological, peripheral, renal and others)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the first visit (only one study visit) after 12 month of follow up
At the first visit (only one study visit) after 12 month of follow up

intervention.description: Subject will fill out a questionnaire when entering the non-interventional study

study_pop.textblock: Children with type 1 diabetes mellitus being treated at diabetes clinics will be selected according to the inclusion and exclusion criteria.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Informed consent obtained from the patient and his legal representative before any study-related activities (Study-related activities are any procedure related to recording of data according to the protocol)
- Type 1 diabetes
- Time since diabetes diagnosed at least 5 years
- Followed for diabetes at consultation for at least 12 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient previously included in this study
- Secondary diabetes
- Pregnant patient
- Patient consulting for an emergency

results_reference.citation: La prise en charge du diabéte de type 1 chez l'enfant en Algérie (DiabCare Pédiatrique); Bensenouci A, Achir M et al.; Médecine des Maladies Métaboliques 2015; Doi: 10.1016/S1957-2557(14)70902-2
